Trigger.Name: !Make a local copy of this folder, edit me and read my description for more details!
Trigger.Description:
This trigger will enable you to afk craft in the background, without having to have FFXIV active and on the foreground.
However, this is a little more involved and advanced to set up than the other trigger.
You should not interact with the game while this is running, but using any other applications should be fine.
You should also not have both the background and foreground trigger active at the same time!
1) You will need (up to) three crafting macros, which you need to place on your hotbars. 2) These hotbar slots need to have keybinds, and then you need to figure out the virtual keycodes for those keys. 3) These keycodes can be found at: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/system.windows.forms.keys 4) You will need to edit the three actions (Continue & Restart) to correspond to your keybinds. You need to make local copies of these triggers to be able to edit them. 5) To get this going, hit the first of your crafting macros - the trigger should pick it up from there after it's done.
